DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study aim assess acute effect several combination lipid differ fatty acid composition glucagon-like-peptide ( GLP ) -2 GLP-1 secretion healthy subject .
DOC.brief_title: Boosting Secretion GLP-2 GLP-1 Intestinal Hormones Nutrients
DOC.detailed_description: In study , investigator aim investigate effect various lipid type GLP-2 GLP-1 secretion . This allow determine importance lipid nutritional solution . Moreover , allow u ass whether exist clinical formula improve order stimulate GLP-2 accelerate intestinal recovery .
DOC.criteria: BMI : 19 24.9 kg.m2 Normal fast glycemia Having obtain informed consent . Gastrointestinal disease ( ulcer ) , pancreatic disease , hepatic disease , metabolic disease / disorder ( diabetes , dyslipidemia ) , renal disease , cardiovascular disease ( arterial hypertension ) , determine medical screen visit blood analysis . Have gastrointestinal surgery ( exception appendix resection ) . Malabsorption disorder Lactose intolerance Significant weight loss past three month ( 5 % initial weight ) Have regular consumption medication Regular supplement ( vitamin mineral ) intake previous month Have alcohol intake : > 2 unit day Smoker ( 2 cigarette day ) Illicit substance intake , state medical screening questionnaire Allergy food medication Anaemia define number erythrocyte hemoglobin Hb hematocrit Ht inferior laboratory normal range Having give blood past three month willing give blood 3 month follow completion study Intense physical activity > 3 hour per week Currently participate participate another clinical trial past month . Volunteer expect comply protocol , include consume rapidly study product , chronic medication intake
